= firewalld =
* systemctl start firewalld
* systemctl enable firewalld
* systemctl stop firewalld
* systemctl disable firewalld
* firewall-cmd --state

= disable selinux =
* sudo vim /etc/sysconfig/selinux
    * SELINUX=disabled
* sestatus

= mount new 4tb drive =
* yum install parted
* sudo fdisk -l
* sudo parted /dev/sdd
    * mklabel gpt
    * unit GB
    * mkpart primary 0.0GB 4000.8GB
    * print
    * quit
* sudo mkfs.xfs -f /dev/sdd
* sudo vim /etc/fstab
    * /dev/sdd /mnt/hdd3 xfs defaults 0 0
* sudo reboot

= add sudo user =
* usermod -aG wheel foo

= group =
* /etc/group

= passwd =
* /etc/passwd

= delete old linux kernel =
* sudo yum install yum-utils
* sudo package-cleanup --oldkernels --count=2
* sudo vim /etc/yum.conf
    * installonly_limit=2
